name: TidyBrain
description: MCP-compliant R code execution and management agent for Claude Desktop
long_description: TidyBrain empowers R programming with Model Context Protocol. It allows Claude to generate, execute, and manage R scripts within a user-specified directory. It provides a complete workflow for statistical programming and data analysis through natural language interaction, including script management, workspace persistence, object inspection, and publication-quality ggplot2 visualization.

prompts.name: Generate ggplot
prompts.description: Helps create publication-quality ggplot figures based on the mtcars dataset.
prompts.text: Make figures using ggplot based on mtcars dataset in ~/Desktop/make_plot.R

prompts.name: Basic Linear Regression Workflow
prompts.description: Guides users to create and run a linear regression analysis using R and ggplot2.
prompts.text: Create an R script for linear regression of mpg vs weight using mtcars dataset, fit the model, and plot diagnostic results.

prompts.name: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)
prompts.description: Assists users in generating summary statistics, correlations, and visualizations for a dataset.
prompts.text: Load the iris dataset, compute summary statistics by species, and generate boxplots and correlation matrices.

prompts.name: Data Cleaning Pipeline
prompts.description: Creates a data cleaning and preprocessing workflow for CSV files.
prompts.text: Read raw_data.csv, handle missing values, remove outliers, transform variables, and save as cleaned_data.csv.

prompts.name: Publication-Ready Plot
prompts.description: Optimizes ggplot2 code for academic publication standards.
prompts.text: Create a scatter plot with regression line and confidence intervals, style it for publication, and export as figure1.png at 800 DPI.

prompts.name: Quick Statistical Summary
prompts.description: Provides an instant summary of key statistics from numeric data.
prompts.text: Run R expression summary(mtcars) and show results in formatted output.

prompts.name: Data Preview Helper
prompts.description: Lets users preview tabular data (CSV/TSV) directly in Claude Desktop.
prompts.text: Preview the first 10 rows of data.csv and describe its column structure.
